title: Fun Things to Watch at the Brit Awards Tonight
summary: The Brit Awards is a big music show happening tonight in Manchester, not London for the first time. Many famous singers and bands are there, like Olivia Dean and Lola Young who have the most nominations. Harry Styles will perform a new song called Aperture, and there might be a funny sketch with host Jack Whitehall. The show has been predictable lately, with stars like Harry Styles winning many awards, but this year could be different with new talent. You can watch to see who wins prizes, enjoy cool performances, and laugh at jokes. It's a fun event for music fans to celebrate pop and rock music.

background_read: The Brit Awards is an annual music awards ceremony in the UK that honors the best in British and international music. It started in 1977 and usually takes place in London, but this year it's in Manchester for the first time. Artists get nominated based on their songs and albums, and winners receive trophies. The show includes live performances and comedy sketches, making it a fun event for families to watch together and learn about popular music.
